## Libraries

<hr>

```{r litelib,eval=FALSE}
library(dbplyr)
library(dplyr)
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
```


```{r lite1, echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE, results='hide', message=FALSE}
library(dbplyr)
library(dplyr)
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
```

## Connect to Database

<hr>

```{r dbply1}
con <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), ":memory:")
```

## Copy Data

<hr>

```{r dbply2}
copy_to(con, mtcars)
```

## reference copied data frame

<hr>

```{r dbply3}
mtcars2 <- tbl(con, "mtcars")
mtcars2
```

## query data

<hr>

```{r dbply4}
mtcars2 %>%
  select(mpg, cyl, drat)
```

## query data

<hr>

```{r dbply5}
mtcars2 %>%
  filter(mpg > 25)
```

## query data

<hr>

```{r dbply6}
mtcars2 %>%
  group_by(cyl) %>%
  summarise(mileage = mean(mpg))
```

## show query

<hr>

```{r dbply7}
mileages <- mtcars2 %>%
  group_by(cyl) %>%
  summarise(mileage = mean(mpg))

mileages %>% show_query()
```

## Collect Data

<hr>

```{r dbply9}
data <- mileages %>% collect()
data
```
